website_summaries.verdict: The Outmost Ventilator from Merrell offered satisfactory features that hikers and outdoor lovers would enjoy. It was positively rated in comfort, breathability, and lightness. Not to mention, it comes at an economical price. However, its unreliable traction on wet grounds and the not-so-flexible sole rendered some hikes off-putting. To summarize, the Merrell Outmost Ventilator can undoubtedly perform in dry, summer hikes. However, tackling wet grounds with this shoe is not advisable.
pros: A majority of Outmost Ventilator owners were convinced with the shoe’s comfortable feel
It rendered a decent amount of arch support, according to a few users
The Merrell Outmost Ventilator was indeed a breathable gear, based on numerous customer reviews
It was a budget-friendly pair, as mentioned by several online buyers
Some hikers approved of its overall snug fit
cons: A handful of day hikers were crestfallen when the grip of the Outmost Ventilator from Merrell failed in wet, slick surfaces
The sole was a bit stiff as if walking on a rock, as noted by a couple of users

customer_reviews.title: I Love Merrell shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd or 4th pair of Merrell shoes and they did not disappoint in any way!!! The fit is great as is the durability and traction.
customer_reviews.author: WendyZ

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Like the price and Merrells brand. Good for unpedestrians friendly area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, long lasting and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have three pair of this model. I wish they were in stock more frequently and more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Just like all of the other Merrells that I own
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering Merrell shoes online. Just like all of the other Merrells that I own, they fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: stefan

customer_reviews.title: it would have been fine. I returned the shoe thinking I must not ...
customer_reviews.text: The heading for this product says "Women's Hiking Shoe." I have large feet and was excited to see a size 12 Women's available. I received a size 12 Mens shoe. Had I received a men's size comparable to a women's size 12 (like maybe a 10?), it would have been fine. I returned the shoe thinking I must not have noticed that it was a men's shoe but I just looked again (to replace the order I returned), and it says it's a women's shoe. Not ordering again as I don't know what I'll get. Love this brand and have had many Merrell shoes but this product listing is confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great mid level shoe solution!
customer_reviews.text: I work 60 hours a week in an electrical shop with cement floors, finding the right footwear has been a struggle. I dont need heavy steel toe boots and light gym shoes dont hold up more than a month or two. 10 hours a day on your feet makes you ache if you dont have the right support. I have tried every kind of insole and I haven't found a solution in over 5 years, I've even spent 150$ on red wing shoes and it hasn't helped. These are the perfect solution, great support, built to last, and light enough to keep moving all day, I've worn them daily for over a month and could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the quality and price of this hiking shoe! I bought them for a week long D.C/NYC trip. Right out of the box they felt broken in. I walked an average of 20 miles a day so I put some mileage on these bad boys. They are resistant to water but not waterproof so pack an extra pair of socks or spray with waterproofing spray.
customer_reviews.author: ponce

customer_reviews.title: These are hiking shoes therefore they are a little heavier ...
customer_reviews.text: These are hiking shoes therefore they are a little heavier than sneakers and a little stiffer I bought them expecting them to be a little more everyday sneaker-like My error not that of Merrell I am a big fan of Merrill and I have purchased many of their products over the years Very high quality
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe with great support
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. His ankles tend to lean inward sloping his shoes all toward the middle. He needs extra arch support and he finds these shoes to do the trick. He can hike a long way and not experience pain in his feet or knees. He actually can wear both the 12.5 and the 13.
customer_reviews.author: MKAY

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of shoes! The sole is very boot-like, which is what I was looking for. They fit much like a boot as well. I need them because I work in a tactical environment and they do the trick. However, I haven't gotten them submerged in water yet, so I don't know what the dry time is like.
customer_reviews.author: jmcdee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. one of the shoestring eyelets pulled off. otherwise 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I love Merrill shoes. they are comfortable out of the box and work great .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Right outta the box and onto a 9.78 mile hike in the Rocky Mountain National Park with 1200+ ft. elevation gain. No regrets and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jlag

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly right out of the box. Husband very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janice H

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. They are very nice shoes. Look good and are comfortable. Good support!!
customer_reviews.author: Leyna

customer_reviews.title: Merrell can't size a shoe anymore
customer_reviews.text: Actually it was too small/narrow and too long, this is the 3rd shoe in a row from Merrell that just won't fit, too bad because I used to love them but their sizing changed.
customer_reviews.author: Ska-t

customer_reviews.title: Merrell's are wonderful shoes whether for men or women
customer_reviews.text: Merrell's are wonderful shoes whether for men or women. The first Merrell's my husband ever tried and he didn't take them off until it was time for sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good grip and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes had a nice thick sole with good grip.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great for scouting!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable for hiking and other outdoor/ camping activities. Looks good with the scout uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, This brand (Merrell) is the most comfortable I have ever worn
customer_reviews.author: Don Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but quality issues?
customer_reviews.text: 1-Star pending a replacement or something. They fit well and they're pretty comfy, but I've only had them a few days and the sole is peeling already.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box comfort. Just walked 4 miles, they feel awesome. Amazon credited me for a style that did not work so I picked these up. Im glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the widest in my size and they are still a little thin. They will work out in the long run as my feet stretch them out.,
customer_reviews.author: Mike Murphy

product_meta.title: Merrell Outmost Vent, Men's Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Men's hiking shoes of the brand Merrel. Model – outmost vent
feature_bullets: M Select GRIP outsole tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it
Merrell Air Cushion in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability
Kinetic Fit Base removable contoured insole for flexible support
